Olivier Assayas' film stars Asia Argento as a woman who had a relationship with Michael Madsen. Madsen is a business man who buys and sells sex in pairs: premium hookers and no-good D-list celebrities – the kind that pay an escort far more than going on limo runs around the city. Things get nasty when one of his friends has a client overdose, allegedly, on heroine injected to her vagina and potentially leaked to him afterwards.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was hoping for a Metal version of music when I listened to a preview cover from Wolf Brother. I wasn’t disappointed but also not surprised enough.
Hordecore , Hello Lutenist and Turmoil Academy are back with this super dark album

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Galaxy beyond. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many characteristics and themes from Asian and American action films alike. It is a story with few twists; masked villains steal stuff but our hero protects his friends and country by squirming through the fire-hose
